name: secretgeek
text:
@roytang “Concentrating too much power in only a couple social media companies is what created the mess we’re in.”

Is is that:

1. Network effects mean that online social mediums tend toward a single dominant player?
2. Government have not intervened to prevent blatant monopolistic activity amongst large dominant companies?
3. We (open source developers) have failed to create/maintain open/distributed platforms?
